title: Cant connect to chat?
body: So I just updated the riot client.... And this happened? Its happening to my friend too who just did the update. Whats up with it?

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na

There were some server issues during this period per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Everything looks to be fine now!  Let me know if you or your friend are still having issues!
i hope they fix it right quick...
Holy shit.... So glad it's not just me. Now we can suffer together! {{item:3070}}
me too riot help
been having the same problem... but o yah the store part works just fine buy it up kiddos... fu*& riot
yes i bought some rp and i cant spend it :-/ wtf
I think this is happening to everyone and its ruining my experience atm cause all i want to do is play doom bots with friends
Yeah! I was just playing doom bots and right before the game ended I lost connection but regained it right before it ended then bam, it doesn't let me connect to chat. {{item:3070}}
